name: retardo
text: A comment left by retardo was marked as spam and excluded. retardo: What a douche. (reported by zaratustra, equinn2006, Sargasm)

name: agika
text: Whuh-oes, Roast Beef repeated himself a third time.  That cannot be good.

name: cracklewater
text: Worse, Beef's dialogue has punctuation in the final panel. That's some serious shit right there.

name: lastlarf
text: It's strange to see Pat show a more caring side of his personality. It's also quite nice. Even though he is an arsehole he's still there for his friends when it really matters.

name: ford
text: My thought was more like "Wow, this magreaux dog thing is so shitty even pat can't be a dick about it."

name: saint
text: That is exactly what I thought. Even Pat knows to be understanding during this.

name: catachresis
text: A comment left by catachresis was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by apocowarg, Overmedicated, BillyLK, aHatOfPig, ArthurDentLives, gardenhead_, duntronic, suprememongoose, alejandroadam, Darthemed)

name: billylk
text: The Magreaux dog arc is underrated by and large.

name: spectre
text: It isn't one of the arcs in the drop-down on the home page . . . I wonder why?

name: catachresis
text:
Look at the lames here. Mild and reasonable criticism.
Grumble.

name: fosters
text: You know the rules. It is not allowed to publicly state that you are not 100% in love with any strip of any arc. Anything less than a 5 at any time is punishable by lames.

name: overmedicated
text: A comment left by overmedicated was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by karljw, 7th_shot, salvagebar, atticusonline, Lumus, Fcannon)

name: ssddr
text: This arc would have carried a lot more weight if Ray had not already died, gone to hell, and came back.

name: wae
text: I was really worried at the start of this arc. I mean, if bad things can happen to Ray, what kind of calamities will be-fall those of us without any kind of fun amulet or cat-thong.

name: tristanhw
text: IT MAKES NO SENSE!

name: toughasnails001
text: I almost posted a comment saying that Pat is out of character in this strip, but then I realized I was wrong. It's a great thing about Achewood that the characters are so multi-dimensional, not defined by a single aspect. No one, not even Pat, is an asshole ALL of the time, and despite the fact that he's a militant vegan, he feels sympathy for his friend after seeing a Magreaux dog.

name: bourbonsamurai
text: Agreed. We all have friends who are jerks, but if they didn't have their moments, they'd just be assholes down the street, not our friend who happens to be a jerk.

name: fosters
text: Well said!

name: red-barchetta
text: This is the new Pat judging by his style, perhaps he's mellowing somewhat now?

name: hateandwar
text:
Pat's just being pragmatic here. He's under the impression that something very bad is going to happen, he's resigned himself to it, and he knows things are going to have to be done.

The sick thing is, I kind of feel Pat. When you think like him, you see stupid people doing stupid things, you see people over reacting or just not acknowledging a problem, and after a while, it starts to get to you. You find yourself getting upset at things that really shouldn't bother you. The world at large doesn't give a shit about global warming, and there's nothing you can do to change that. I can see where Pat's anger comes from, and it's a shame he can't deal with it better.

Cue this comment being lamed into invisibility for sympathizing with Pat/not making some kind of crack about Pat taking it in the can.

name: selbencoirlo
text:
At first I was going to chubby this post to reassure you, because I generally agree with your position.
Then I started feeling manipulated by your last line, and started thinking maybe it was just a ploy to get chubbies.

So I'm not going to do anything. I figure these two facets balance out. In a kinder world I might have chubbied you, but it was not to be.

name: utv
text: This right here is exactly why the chubby/lame system makes assetbar a lame popularity contest.

name: soticoto
text: Story of my life.

name: jackparsons
text: Love the seeping stain in the last panel.

name: dropkickpikachu
text: I keep trying to figure out what you're talking about and I just can't . :(

name: farqussus
text: Do you mean the grass? On the ground?

name: rowboat
text: I'm afraid he does.

name: jbacardi
text:
Can't help noticing how much Pat is beginning to look like his dad now...

It tried to walk, Pat, it tried to walk...

name: ringwoodcomics
text: A BLOO BLOO! A BLOO BLOO BLOO!

name: starch
text: I like this strip a lot. its not that funny, but its really touching. I really feel for beef in the sixth panel.

name: xiaomimi
text:

Philippe: It was Chinese food night today!

name: cpnglxynchos
text: take a hike, Italian noodles, indeed.

name: zapatos
text: I voted "1" because I look like Beef does after reading this.  Hell of dieing.

name: thumb
text: It really does make no sense.

name: pumpinpedal
text: It's just wrong to laugh at this.

text: [size=50]Rene & Georgette Magreaux With Their Dog After The War[/size]
